Scene:
Shundo Jiroemon's House
(Shundō Jirōemon yashiki / 春藤次郎右衛門屋敷)

Play: The Vendetta by a Samurai in Rags (敵討襤褸錦敵討襤褸錦)

Production: February 1977

– Click image to view.



Narrators (Tayu):

Toyotake Matsukadayū (豊竹松香大夫)

Takemoto Oritayū V (see also Takemoto Tsunatayū IX) (竹本織大夫 (五))



Shamisen Players:

Nozawa Katsushi (see also Toyozawa Tomisuke V) (野澤勝司)

Tsuruzawa Enza V (鶴澤燕三 (五))
